author: Rubberducky
title: A good starting point for any adventures collector
review:
The Car is clever and very good, so is the scorpion trap. but the base isnt amazing, fun but not amazing.
good touch with the mummy. i could just imagin the bad guy going in and then dying first hehe.

author: hustla187
title: not a bad set
review: This is a really OK set. It comes with Johnny, Baron von Baron, a mummy, a tomb, a temple, and jeep. What more would you ask for? This is one of those sets that will stand the test of time. A must own for any Adventurers fan.
